title: Four line conics
creator_credit: Trevor Fletcher, Sidney Goldsmith and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: An experimental mathematics film designed to elucidate the study of four-line conics. Of value for students and specialists in advanced mathematics, the uniqueness of its design, colour and animation also makes the film aesthetically appealing to the layperson. (Awards: Six awards including London; Budapest)
